Texts.Chs: 回到位于^orange;远星庇护所^reset;的^orange;内尼基^reset;处
谢谢你，我的新远星者伙伴！这正是我要找的。拿着这顶头盔和这些代币——这些都是你应得的！
Texts.Eng: Thank you, my fellow Starfarer! This is exactly what I was looking for. Take this helmet and these tokens - you have earned them!

Texts.Chs: 朋友，你愿意帮助一位受苦的远星者吗？I'm 为我的一个小实验，我需要 一个^orange;沙行喷射者的贮砂囊^white;和一根^orange;沙地爬行者的牙齿^white;，但现在我被困在这里，而我的船正在修理... 如果你能替我去^green;狩猎沙漠星球中的沙行喷射者和沙地爬行者^white;，我将感激不尽！
Texts.Eng: Would you help out a fellow Starfarer, friend? I'm in need of a ^orange;Sandspitter's Sack ^white;and a ^orange;Sandcrawler's Tooth ^white;for a little experiment of mine, but I am stuck here while my ship is being repaired... If you could ^green;hunt down a Sandspitter and a Sandcrawler on a desert planet^white;, I would be most grateful!
